description: Designed for all-purpose wear, all winter long, this hoodie keeps you warm with advanced thermal reflectivity, baffled construction, and 700-fill RDS certified down insulation. Plus, it's Interchange compatible and packs down into its own pocket.
name: Columbia Sportswear Pebble Peak Down Hooded Jacket - Tall - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester, 700 Fill Power Goose Down Insulation, RDS Certified
